Package org.jcatapult.deployer.service

This package contains the service APIs for the jcatapult deployer framework

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BetterSimpleCompletor.SimpleCompletorFilter Filter for elements in the completor.
CLIService Interface service for command line interaction
ValidationService<T> Service Interface for validating beans of type T
XmlService<T> Interface service for unmarshalling xml
 

Class Summary
BetterSimpleCompletor Used for tab completion
CLIServiceImpl JLine Implementation of the CLIService
DeployXmlService Uses apache commons XMLConfiguration object to extract properties from the deploy.xml
ProjectXmlService Unmarshalls xml via the apache commons XMLConfiguration object
ValidationServiceImpl<T extends Validatable> Concrete validation service that uses the java net commons Validatable interface to perform validation on domain object
 

Exception Summary
XmlServiceException Thrown from the XmlService if there's an error during xml unmarshalling
 

Package org.jcatapult.deployer.service Description

This package contains the service APIs for the jcatapult deployer framework
